attributes.action: include the 100 pathfinder bus in nottingham under NCT prices as it is a NCT bus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all NCT buses in nottingham are £3 a day and the pathfinder is a NCT bus but is not involved as it goes to a wealthy area we are not allowed to use all day tickets and have to pay £4 a day return and further expenses for travel within the city.

rejection.details: This petition should be addressed to the bus company involved.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
